class_notes: This course is NOT the same as BIOL 342 and is also offered as IBS 539.  This course covers ecology and systems biology of species interactions, with a focus on microbial and microbiome ecology, including interactions between microbes and their hosts.  This course relies heavily on the primary literature, and a basic familiarity with college-level calculus is recommended.  Prerequisites:  Biology 142, Biology 142L, and Biology 370.   This course may be taken as elective credit for the biology major and fulfills a WRITING REQUIREMENT for the GERs.
